title: Diary of the late Rajah of Kolhapoor, during his visit to Europe in 1870.
author: Rajah Ram Chuttraputtee
snippet: I took my luncheon. Afterwards we walked to Newbattle Abbey, the scat of the Marquis of Lothian. It is a very old and historical place.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The Earl of Surrey, a gallant English nobleman, had the charge to conduct the Princess Margaret to her new kingdom of Scotland. The King came to meet her at Newbattle Abbey,within six miles of Edinburgh. He was gaUantlydressed in a jacket of crimson velvet, bordered withcloth of gold, and had hanging at his back his lure,as it is called, an implement which is used in hawking.
